name: Who is Abby
description:
In Who is Abby, players step into a narrative-driven experience that melds the immersive exploration of walking simulators with the intricate interactivity of point-and-click adventures. Delve into Tom's relentless search for answers in a world shrouded in mystery and ambiguity. As each chapter unfolds, secrets emerge from the shadows, pulling you deeper into Tom's quest to understand the enigma surrounding Abby.

Early Access:

"Who is Abby" welcomes players to partake in its developmental journey during the Early Access stage. As the narrative unfolds, here's what awaits:

Current Content: Begin the game's intricate story by navigating through the prologue and the subsequent three chapters. Providing an introduction to Tom's quest, setting the foundation for the evolving mystery.

Feedback Welcomed: Being in Early Access allows us to gather invaluable player feedback. We encourage players to share their insights and experiences, helping us refine and enhance the game to meet your expectations and we continue adding the later chapters.

Full Release Plans: Our goal for the full release includes adding more levels, refining gameplay mechanics, graphical polish and expanding on the story. With your support and feedback during Early Access, we'll work diligently to bring the full vision of "Who is Abby" to life.

Features:


Narrative-Driven Gameplay: Combining the elements of walking simulators with the interactivity of classic point n click adventures, enter into a world meticulously crafted both in visual detail and narrative depth. Immerse yourself into a multi-chapter story line that keeps you guessing at every turn. Experience a gripping story centred around Tom's relentless search for Abby. What secrets await?

Interactive Exploration: Navigate beautifully detailed environments, uncovering clues and hints essential to the narrative. Each discovery pushes the story forward.

Stunning Graphics and Sound: Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Who is Abby boasts cutting-edge visuals that bring every detail of Tom's world to life. Each chapter unfolds with rich environments, enhanced by our dedication to graphic finesse.
